ygData.subject: Re: new uncamp places??
ygData.msgSnippet: In the end, he only manage to fight 1 mob, all ganna stolen by you. The incident happen after you make your speech. Steal my turn still complain that I m
ygData.messageBody:
In the end, he only manage to fight 1 mob, all ganna stolen by you. The
incident happen after you make your speech. Steal my turn still complain that
I'm trying to steal his kill. But after that, no one healed him, all pretend
that he's invisible. In the end, he lan lan went off as no one healed him.

Son of a submariner!!!

LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Heheh too bad I didnt hear what that lvl 19 warrior said, otherwise I would
> have fire back. Maybe I was mediating or wat. But when he tried to kill
> my turn, I steal it from him. He then proceed to attack the next spawn
> (which is Ser's and Einan's turn) and I steal from him again. Then I throw
> the remark 'I said it's Ser's turn, or all dun get any". Wah sai, that's
> the coolest sentence I ever made in EQ so far, and imagine it's toward a
> lvl 19 warrior ;) He, the female warrior and that shaman also dun dare to
> make a noise, hehe. But too bad when I made that sentence, already OOM, so
> I go med. Later come down he disappear liao.
>
> Ziltus
>
> On Monday, June 28, 1999 12:32 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
> wrote:
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > Still remember the level 19 warrior. Damn fucked up. this is what he said
> when
> > Einan and I tried to practice a bit of combat skills.
> >
> > Warrior: That's very cheap of you to try and steal kills
> > Me: ???
> > Warrior: You tried to trade with me to prevent me from attacking the mob
> so
> > that your partner can attack it and steal the kill
> > Me: Hello, you know something called INSTRUMENT CHANGING? I was trying to
> equip
> > a bloody DRUM.
> > Me: And besides, how can a level 7 cleric and 10 BARD steal kills from a
> > warrior that's of higher level than us?
> > Warrior: Whatever, I could just take out my BBC and kill off
> everything(at this
> > point, I was starting to hear that damn Shania Twain song playing in my
> head.
> > That don't impress me much)
> >
> > Then this goon dashed off into fighting everything that spawn.
> >
> > 2 fights later, HP drop to around 15% (for some reason, I always like to
> look
> > at the HP status of people who pissed me off)
> >
> > He finally went off and Ziltus, a female warrior, a shaman and us,
> continue our
> > hunt.
> >
> > LKW wrote:
> >
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > >
> > > I suggest North Ro Derv Camp next to mountain for lvl 10-15. I earned
> my
> > > lvl 13, 14 and 15 there, still giving me so-so xp and good loot at lvl
> 15.
> > > I hunt with Ser/Einan. They team and we take turn to kill. Sometime
> the
> > > place can be quite crowded and pple can just come in without any words
> and
> > > start hunting themselves (ie act blur even they see we already there).
> For
> > > this type of pple wiz always got the best mean to teach them a lesson -
> > > steal their kills when they hunt monsters ard 40% dam, hehe. No joke,
> even
> > > a lvl 19 warrior lost kill to me, hehehe. I guess that's the best
> > > 'ability' a wiz pocess. ;)
> > > Once I get lvl 16, I will go camp 2 since there is more thugs spawning
> > > there.
> > >
> > > Above lvl 16 I dunno, still havent reach there.
> > >
> > > I think Oasis hunting caimen and croc also not bad xp for lvl 10-15,
> but
> > > the loot is pretty lousy.
> > >
> > > So far I'm quite 'conservative' in hunting - only been to BB, G
> Faydark,
> > > CB, EC, WC, Ro and Oasis. Places like Guk or L Faydark not counted coz
> I
> > > go there kena killed very fast - not to mentioned any xp or loot.
> > >
> > > Maybe it's time we go Ak'Anon for some mino hunting? Garren, Yiyang
> and
> > > Leshrec can take mino knight/hero while the rest take mino slave, hehe.
> > > Alternatively is to go back CB hunt trainer (for small shinny shield)
> and
> > > derv - always wanna go back CB hunt coz I died too many times there,
> can't
> > > forget the damn place, haha. If u like role-playing quest, I dun mind
> we
> > > go back CB one day and do the quest for screaming mace. I think that
> will
> > > be the best item currently we can give to our SOWer Trifrost and healer
> > > Einan (must get this healer lvl up fast).
> > >
> > > Tonight I will con't to brew for 1-2 hrs b4 going to Ro derv camp
> again.
> > > Ser & Ein, join me if interested ;)
> > >
> > > Ziltus
> > >
> > > On Monday, June 28, 1999 10:06 AM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
> > > wrote:
> > > > From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
> > > >
> > > > Any one of u guys pls give tips and info on places with decent
> xp-lvling
> > > .
> > > >
> > > > Im sick of HH pass. All the steal kiilin and the general anmosity in
> that
> > > > area, i just dont enjoy it no more. Im in this RPGing for a good
> gaming
> > > > experience. Hack, i sometimes dont care if I lvl or not. I find
> questing
> > > > more fun but the way things r, i cant go for certain quest if my lvl
> is
> > > not
> > > > up to the quest standard.
> > > >
> > > > So, U guys pls share on places we can go to for lvl 10-16, 17-20,
> etc.
> > > > I havent been to PAW, it is good.
> > > > It Najena to diff ??
> > > > We did Runnyeyes and was slaughter every chaim.
> > > >
> > > > Come on lets have it. Sereph, Garren, Leshrec, we guys been around
> > > places.
> > > > Spill the beans or i use my new double wielding Super poison, anti
> magic
> > > > Parang i just order fro me monk Guild.
> > > >
> > > > Yiyang
> > > > Monk'eying nowhere
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: hans ng <nahemah@...>
> > > > To: eq <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

> > > >

> > > > >
> > > > >i cant seem to work eq while downloadin stuff newsgroups....have any
> of
> > > > >u tried havin someother program run in the background b4? i know my
> > > > >norton anti virus has started up by itself b4 while i m in eq with
> out
> > > > >interuptin my game so while cant i DL stuff andplay?????
